name: Seed Master
description:
Resume

You are a human with forest spirit power.

You need  to defend the Forest Spirit against Robot 
while he cast the Primordial Seed power

Try to  become the Seed Master

Update possible
  • More variety of robots 
  • Add more seed power ( Remove  in this version for lack of time)
